title: 1000th win.. ARAM
body:
I emailed about wanting to play with a Rioter for my 1000th ARAM win, they told me to make a post on the forums so here I am! I'd like to thank everyone who has helped me get to this point. I couldn't have done it without your love and support to get me passed the dark times. Who wants to be the Chloe to my Max? http://imgur.com/sjNpVEp

edit// I'm on east coast time!

replies.body: Random try: Are you free in the next hour?
BOOM! You gotcha self a rioter! P.S LOVE DAT NAME! GROOOVYYYYLORRDDDDDDDDDDDD

I'm free the rest of the evening! Thanks for trying in any case.

edit here too, I'm on east coast!
What if they play with you and you lose?
I think a summer 2017 internship would be appropriate compensation!

> I think a summer 2017 internship would be appropriate compensation!

http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/bert-book-reaction-sesame-street.gif

Would I possibly be able to joint this match?  O.o
I would never, teams are built on a foundation of trust that I wouldn't dream about breaking... but if I just HAPPEN to get a champ I'm bad with, the you never know what will happen >.>

{{champion:16}} *Flashes into enemy team and gives First Blood*

Whoops, thought I could 1v5. Sorry, guys.

I also asked to play with a Rioter for an ARAM celebratory win (win #3000)...took 2 weeks before I got said Red to play with. And it happened purely at lucky random then too.

So best of luck to you.
Hells yes, awesome game, really gripping storyline... and music... Loved it!
I love the LiS reference. Kudos.
bruh u mentioned lis take my upvote and congrats.   i think i just shed a {{item:3070}}  just thinking about the damn game.
